entry.title: A Magician and his King
entry.summary:
Author: Eliott_Marsh

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,606Chapters: 35/?Kudos: 101

Summary: He felt the hairs on the back of his neck stand-up. He wasn't alone. Before he could fully process this information, he was halfway across the room with his dagger at the throat of his manservant, who was snoring peacefully on Arthur's windowsill with a broom clutched in his elbow.He breathed in sharply, adrenaline ramping up a notch as he realized how close he had been to cutting Merlin's throat.Dropping the blade to his side, Arthur studied him. Merlin's long form collapsed in on itself to fit on the small shelf, his inky black hair curling against the morning dew that was gathering on the window panes. His thick eyelashes were fluttering lightly over his pale cheeks and one of his hands was twitching, but he slept soundly.OR: The Merthur fic you didn't know you needed.

entry.title: take my heart, and we will run away together
entry.summary:
Author: goldenstrings

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,868Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: Then there was Arthur, who was standing on the other side of Uther. His arms were crossed over his chest, his face carefully blank as he stared down at the wooden floor. Merlin could see it, though. The pain and hurt in his crystalline eyes, the way his fingers were gripping onto the material of his jacket. Merlin couldn’t help the shame he felt, despite knowing that he didn’t do anything wrong. He wasn’t a monster, but, for a moment, he felt like he was.

entry.title: Crimson in the Pines
entry.summary:
Author: nooooplsnoooo

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,808Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 126

Summary: The Prince, despite his best efforts, could not stop his hand from shaking as he held his sword to Merlin’s- no, not Merlin’s- pulse. The boy tried to crawl backwards a bit, away from the sharp edge, but Arthur just moved forward with him. The sword trembled with adrenaline against the sorcerer’s pale skin. Arthur couldn’t help but notice the boy’s ruddy cheeks, bright red from the cold and exertion. The snow made light dance in his tear tracks. The neckerchief that Merlin commonly wore was discarded on the snow; It must have fallen during the fight. It left his smooth neck exposed to the cold, riddled with goosebumps, and unmarred save for the blood-soaked steel, pressing in on his pulse point. Arthur could not deny that the… thing wearing Merlin’s face was beautiful. Merlin is forced to reveal his powers during an attack. Chaos and angst ensue. I feel like most people give Arthur too much credit in magic reveals.

entry.title: Some and Now None of You
entry.summary:
Author: Isthisusernameavailableornot

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 107,055Chapters: 36/47Kudos: 886

Summary: "Let him think I hate him. If that’ll stop him from risking his neck for me over and over again, then it’s a sacrifice I don’t have to think twice about." — Arthur finds out Merlin has magic. He also finds out how often Merlin risked his life for him and so, he does the only thing he can think of to protect him: banishment. Hurt and angry, Merlin leaves and swears to not look back. But, when two years pass and Morgana shows up at Merlin’s door, urging him to fill Gaius’ position as Court Physician, Merlin agrees. He really doesn’t know why, but Arthur is sure Merlin would do just about anything to get on his nerves. Unprepared for the shock of seeing Merlin back in the castle, Arthur is forced to speed along his plans to lift the ban on magic. But between stubborn councilors, a mysterious plague, a still angry Merlin, and Morgana being Morgana, Arthur is fairly certain he’ll lose his mind before the first year of his reign even ends.

entry.title: complex (demo)
entry.summary:
Author: ireadand_write

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,774Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 48

Summary: They sit there quietly for a few minutes, clock ticking away as Arthur drinks his coffee and Merlin lets the steam of his own waft up his nostrils. Something about the simple potential, the easy domesticity, sets Merlin off.Before he can stop it, he sets his coffee down, puts his head in his hands.“Merlin, what—” Arthur starts, distress evident from the way he sets his cup down as well and reaches forward as though more touch could help this.“Why do you keep doing this to me, Arthur?” Merlin asks, breath huffy and voice all cloggy-sounding. He’s embarrassed, he realizes, that he’s let this go on in the foolish hope that Arthur will wake up and realize that he does love Merlin, not Gwen.He feels Arthur still, because his arms are splayed out in front of himself on the table as though he were trying to reach for Merlin.Merlin gets no answer to his question, though.“Leave, please, Arthur,” Merlin says roughly; he has to force himself not to call him back when he hears Arthur take a breath in sharply, before standing, gathering his few things, and leaving the apartment.

entry.title: A Hidden Legacy
entry.summary:
Author: Shippeoforever

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,709Chapters: 23/67Kudos: 78

Summary: Merthur receives a surprise neither of them expected, turning not only their lives upside down, but also those of everyone around them.Will they be able to find their happy ending, while hiding everything from King Uther with the help of their friends?****Stay tuned to find out and keep reading. It's going to be a multi-chapter story. The number of chapters is unknown yet, but more tags will surely be added soon. So stay tuned for updates.
